role.argrole: Ambiguous on whom? (mostly marked by على)

example.parse: (PP (PREP على) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-TPC-1 (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الموقف) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_ACC الرسمي) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_ACC اللبناني)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN القرار)))) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS جاء) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_ACC متفقاً) (PP (PREP و) (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC وجهة) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN النظر))) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC السورية)) (PUNC ,) (PRN (CONJ و) (S (NP-SBJ (PRON_3FS هي)) (S-NOM-PRD (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_NOM كون) (NP-SBJ (POSS_PRON_3MS ه)) (UCP (ADJP (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_ACC غامضاً)) (CONJ و) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC غير) (NP (ADJP (ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN واضح) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN المعالم)))))))))))))
